name: xkcd-search-bot
description: Telegram bot for searching for revelant xkcd comics inline.

scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:build && npm run build:elm:prod && tsc
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:build && npm run build:elm:dev
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:localDeps && npm run build:prod
scripts.install:localDeps: cd packages/elmegram.js && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.launch:dev: npm run build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run start:dev
scripts.launch:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run start

author: author
